data.meta_description: Since 1988 EAVE has developed a unique European network of producers, industry experts, funders, markets and festivals. Graduates are able to obtain unlimited access to our online services.
data.text:
DONATE TO THE EAVE ALAN FOUNTAIN INTERNATIONAL SCHOLARSHIP FUND

Our beloved longtime collaborator, mentor and friend, Alan Fountain, passed away in 2016. Alan Fountain initially joined EAVE in 2000 and since that time actively served in several important capacities, from Head of Studies to our President. During his time with EAVE, he worked directly with over 1000 participants – from every corner of Europe as well as many from the rest of the world – doubtlessly changing their careers and profoundly affecting their professional lives.

An EAVE Producers Workshop scholarship has been set up in the name of, and especially to honour the memory of Alan Fountain. Donations are now being collected for the EAVE ALAN FOUNTAIN INTERNATIONAL SCHOLARSHIP FUND.
